amendatorysection.catchline: Statutory limitation on budgets; not applicable; when.
amendatorysection.para: Any statutory limitation on the budget, funded by property taxes, of a political subdivision authorized to levy a tax or cause a tax to be levied shall not apply to any such political subdivision which has adopted a tax or budgetary limitation on property taxes by vote of the electors of the political subdivision pursuant to the Local Option Tax Control Act or any home rule charter.
